pageContext.claim: “Look, when I came in -- under the Obama administration, North Korea was a disaster. You were going to war, folks, whether you know it or not. You were going to war. There was no talking. There was testing. We didn't have our people back. We didn't have our great hostages back. Now we're getting the remains, we're doing a lot of things now.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence to support this claim. Trump exaggerates the possibility of war, which had been heightened by his own harsh rhetoric.
